title: Ironside Maokai to go alongside Ironside Malphite?
body:
The skin itself looks like it's made for Maokai; I also believe Maokai's abilities would look much better than Malphite's with the Ironside skin. The splash art would be relatively similar to Ironside Malphite, just modeled on another ship (e.g. black sails and flags, a different coloured hull etc). The in game appearance of the skin would also be similar to the Ironside Malphite skin except it would be catered to Maokai's in game attributes (his walk, his auto attacks, his size etc).

-His Q ability (Arcane Smash) would be somewhat similar, maybe with small tweaks to the colour etc.

-Maokai's W ability (Twisted Advance) would be exactly like the bilgewater "butcher's bridge" mark/dash ability animation (seen here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pn575_vlPwg).

-His E ability (Sapling Toss) would instead launch cannonballs that move towards the enemies via small crab legs that sprout beneath them when a targetable enemy is in range; the cannonballs would include a fuse that slowly burns out over the 35 seconds they stay viable for, then explode.

-His R ability (Vengeful Maelstrom) would create a swirling whirlpool around Maokai in which the debris of sunken ships would float around him for the duration of his ultimate.

Viable skin concept, yes or no?
